llm.feedback:
Up | 0–3 weeks | Strengthen the causal chain from AI/cloud productivity to durable cash flow and moat expansion with explicit anchors (Azure growth 39% YoY in MSFT Q4 FY2025; cloud spend 21.2% CAGR 2024–2030) | What to watch: Azure growth staying in the high-30s to 40% range and megacloud free cash flow margins expanding, plus corroborating cash returns signals (0G3A676BP)(DBFSBGOEX) | 65% (0G3A676BP)(DBFSBGOEX)

Up | 2–8 weeks | Tighten scenario structure to anchor the up-path in explicit catalysts: IPO momentum (95 deals in 2025, $12.9B vs 73/$16B in 2024) and small-cap rotation with robust risk controls | What to watch: confirm IPO pace translates into earnings visibility and that Russell–S&P valuation gaps narrow as value/quality leadership emerges; maintain IUSV/XLV ballast and AZO overlay signals (Q7VVGNSQE)(4661GWFP7)(2YP1X9B4T)(J0D96V7MS) | 60% (Q7VVGNSQE)(4661GWFP7)(2YP1X9B4T)(J0D96V7MS)

Down | 8–24 weeks | Emphasize regime risk from growth slowdown and megacloud margin compression | What to watch: Azure growth drift into low- to mid-20s% and megacloud FCF margins compress beyond baseline; observe dispersion in levered software profitability (DBFSBGOEX)(9X7XOLXMH) | 50% (0G3A676BP)(DBFSBGOEX)(9X7XOLXMH)

Down | 0–3 weeks | Tighten bear-case triggers and explicit invalidation paths around Intel vesting, Canada carve-out mirroring, and policy path | What to watch: vesting timing clarity; whether USMCA carve-out is mirrored; inflation path that delays rate cuts; XPeng/NIO margin and Shopify momentum signals; define invalidation thresholds to downgrade base case | 40% (XQWTVR71K)(OB27SL8WU)(HE99QDK4J)(19NO2GMNF)
